GLUTEN-FREE RECIPES
Pumpkin Chocolate Cheesecake
  • 1/2 cup Cloud 9 All-Purpose Baking Mix
  • 2 ounces unsweetened chocolate
  • 1/4 cup butter
Melt the chocolate and butter in a mixing bowl. Add Cloud 9 Baking Mix, sugar, egg, salt, and vanilla and mix together. Spread the mixture on the bottom of a buttered 10″ springform pan. Bake at 300°F for 15 minutes, and then allow to cool. Read More...
Chocolate-chip Cookies
  • 1 3/4 cups Cloud 9 All-Purpose Baking Mix
  • 250g bag chocolate chips
  • 7/8 cup butter
Preheat oven to 375°F, adjust rack to the middle of the oven. Line 2 cookie sheets with parchment paper. Whisk the Cloud 9 Baking Mix, baking soda and salt together to create the dry mix and set aside. Melt butter then mix together... Read More...
Vanilla Cupcakes
  • 2 cups Cloud 9 All-Purpose Baking Mix
  • 1 tsp vanilla
  • 4 tbsp butter
Preheat oven to 350°F. Line cupcake pans with approximately 18 paper liners. Whisk together the Cloud 9 Baking Mix, baking powder, salt and set aside. Heat the milk and the butter in the microwave until the butter melts, stir in the vanilla. Set aside. Read More...
Chocolate Banana Bread
  • 1 1/4 cups Cloud 9 All-Purpose Baking Mix
  • 1 cup of sweet chocolate (Baker's yellow box)
  • 3 ripe mashed bananas
Preheat oven to 350°F. Lightly butter three 6″ x 3″ mini loaf pans. Mix Cloud 9 Baking Mix with baking powder, salt, sugar, baking soda in a large bowl. In a food processor, chop up the sweet chocolate and the walnuts. Read More...
Waffles
  • 2 cups Cloud 9 All-Purpose Baking Mix
  • 1 package of 'traditional' active dry yeast
  • 2 cups of milk
Dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of warm water in a large mixing bowl and set aside until foamy (for about 10 minutes). Add milk, butter, salt, sugar, Cloud 9 Baking Mix and eggs to the water and yeast mixture. Whisk all of these until well combined then... Read More...
Ginger Snap Cookies
  • 2 cups Cloud 9 All-Purpose Baking Mix
  • 2 tsp ginger
  • 1/4 cup molasses
Preheat oven to 350°F. In a bowl, mix Cloud 9 Baking Mix, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, ginger and set aside. In a mixer, beat oil, sugar and egg on medium speed until mixture is smooth and light. Add molasses and mix, scraping down... Read More...
